package.name: Net_DIME
package.summary: The PEAR::Net_DIME class implements DIME encoding

release.notes: This is the initial independent release of the Net_DIME package. Some of the code probably needs to be PEAR-ified a bit more. This needs to be integrated with streams, if there is anything needed to do that. More testing needs to be done, but it encodes/decodes it's own messages.
